name: Data Analyst
description:
POWr is in search of a KZ Data Analyst to join our team of super talented, enthusiastic and mildly quirky POWr Rangers. At POWr, we embrace a fast-moving, high energy, and ever-improving environment. We’re looking for a Data Analyst who thrives in a fast-paced culture, and enjoys working with a small but mighty team in our Almaty office.

As a Data Analyst, you’ll work closely with our leadership team, highlighting critical data to help us better understand and support our users. You’ll identify opportunities for strategic optimization through product analysis, and make informed proposals to lead team leaders and executives toward data-driven decisions.

Our Data Analyst is able to pull relevant data across a variety of databases and systems to achieve a high level analysis. Your ability to deliver actionable and insightful reporting and analysis across departments will guide our ship toward a stronger product and happy customers.

Responsibilities

  • Assist product team in doing product research and assembling large, complex sets of data that meet non-functional and functional business requirements

  • Working with stakeholders including the Executive, Product, Data and Design teams to support their data infrastructure needs while assisting with data-related technical issues

  • Leverage data and analytics across the company, finding opportunities for improvement and growth

  • Work closely with department leads to identify strategic opportunities and develop best practices

  • Establish and manage governing processes for collection and application of metrics

  • Building analytical tools to utilize the data pipeline, providing actionable insight into key business performance metrics including user acquisition, conversion, and revenue

  • Navigate through small and large data sets, communicating problems and solutions to necessary team members.

  • Identifying, designing and implementing internal process improvements including re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, optimizing data delivery, and automating manual processes

  • Building required infrastructure for optimal extraction, transformation and loading of data from various data sources using AWS and SQL technologies

Qualifications

  • A degree in computer science or equivalent.

  • Interest in spreadsheets, Google Analytics and data.

  • Comfortable with SQL, databases and/or business intelligence tools

  • Experience with or willingness to learn Ruby on Rails, with opportunity to grow into full stack development.

  • Experience with or willing to learn data analysis developing to data analytics competency.

  • Experience with startups or small, fast-moving companie

  • Global team player who works well with others, specifically us. Flexibility to sync with US and other time zone(s).

  • Someone who respects and practices our company culture on a daily basis.
